This week, my bill to crack down on the leak of private financial information unanimously passed the @FinancialCmte. We must ensure that sensitive market information is protected in order to prevent potential insider trading. Read more: http://bit.ly/2zLZVK1 pic.twitter.com/GekQhKIpGx

For three decades, special interests have been tailoring the tax code to their needs. Today, we fought back and passed #TaxReform that puts money in the pockets of West Tennesseans, not Washington bureaucrats.

As I continue to receive and review information about this important legislation, I look forward to working with my colleagues and @POTUS to pass our #TaxReform plan that will empower the middle class and boost the American economy.
We are doubling the standard deduction, so married couples will not pay any taxes on their first $24,000 earned. #TaxReformpic.twitter.com/LqpFe9pkmm
A hometown, small business will see a $25,000 reduction in taxes, allowing the owner to expand, raise wages and hire more employees. #TaxReformpic.twitter.com/4S04IV6dJ0

Unfortunately, when catastrophes occur, often thousands are affected at one time, overwhelming the select insurance adjusters in the area.
When disaster strikes, it is critical that consumers can reach their insurance provider immediately and receive their claim soon after.
